Detailed Description

GLIB replacement for libhal, providing callbacks.

Author:
Richard Hughes <richard@hughsie.com>
Date:
2005-10-02
This module handles the callbacks for HAL, and lets a program register a hook, and assign a callback. It is designed as a more robust framework than using libhal.

Definition in file glibhal-callback.c.

Function Documentation
